alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Gibson; Henderson; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 10:31AM CDT until July 01 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL HENDERSON...SOUTHEASTERN GIBSON...SOUTHWESTERN CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 1031 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fairview, or near Humboldt, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Humboldt, Milan, Fairview, Three Way, Atwood, Blue Goose, Carroll, Medina, Gibson, Claybrook, Youngs Crossing, West, New Enterprise, Ledbetter, Lavinia, Gilmore, Sitka, Goat City and Oakfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
